alert.note: Alert for Judith Gap; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 4:49PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Wheatland County through 515 PM MDT... At 447 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Deadmans Basin Reservoir, or 14 miles east of Harlowton, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. Light accumulations of hail is possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Wheatland County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
